pkgmetadata.longdescription: Common Mean Vector under Copula Models // Estimate bivariate common mean vector under copula models with known correlation. In the current version, available copulas include the Clayton, Farlie-Gumbel-Morgenstern (FGM), and Gaussian copulas. See Shih et al. (2019) doi:10.1080/02331888.2019.1581782 for details under the FGM copula.
